thread.title: TV | The Graham Norton Show
thread.title_full: TV | The Graham Norton Show - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | The Graham Norton Show
text: It's a James Bond special on tonight's Graham Norton Show, certainly a lot cooler than the country music special happening on The Late Late tonight, although that might depend on who you were talking to. The man himself Mr. Daniel Craig will be joining Graham, as well as Naomie Harris and Christoph Waltz, who star as Miss Moneypenny and Franz Oberhauser in the newly released James Bond movie 'Spectre'. Plus, in a live world exclusive, singer Sam Smith performs the theme to the movie called 'Writing on the Wall', which rapidly rose to the top of the UK singles chart within days of its release. Although it's no G lldfiinnnnger!
